N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 31.4 - Submission of evidence

State Regulations
(a) Evidence of
financial responsibility shall be submitted to the department at the following
address: Major Petroleum Facilities Section

Accounting and Fiscal Services Bureau

New York State Department of Transportation
1220 Washington Avenue

Building 5, State Campus

Albany, New York 12232

Submission to the department shall not occur until actual
receipt by the department. (b) Should the department find the evidence
of financial responsibility submitted by an owner or operator of a major
facility or vessel to be unacceptable or insufficient, the department shall
notify such owner or operator within 15 days of submittal or within 15 days of
the department's receipt of material or information which renders such evidence
on file with the department unacceptable or insufficient, as the case may
be. Notes
